SQL.LOAD: SELECT interface_split_rule_id, source, source_code, new_source_code, active, field_name, field_operator, field_value, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date FROM elp_interface_split_rules WHERE active = 'Y' and (source, source_code) in (select source, source_code from elp_interface_split_rules where interface_split_rule_id = :interface_split_rule_id)
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT interface_split_rule_id, source, source_code FROM ( SELECT interface_split_rule_id, source, source_code, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY source || source_code ORDER BY interface_split_rule_id) rank FROM elp_interface_split_rules WHERE active = 'Y' --dynamic_where_clause ) WHERE rank = 1
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_interface_split_rules SET new_source_code = :new_source_code, field_name = :field_name, field_operator = :field_operator, field_value = :field_value, active = :active, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE interface_split_rule_id = :interface_split_rule_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_interface_split_rules ( interface_split_rule_id, source, source_code, new_source_code, active, field_name, field_operator, field_value, created_by ) VALUES ( :interface_split_rule_id, :source, :source_code, :new_source_code, :active, :field_name, :field_operator, :field_value, :created_by )
